PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-00932021-02-26,  ,  ,  ECCC,  HC,  TC,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
Canada Shipping Act, 2001
Canadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
Environmental Violations Administrative Monetary Penalties Act
SubjectCross-border Movement of Hazardous Waste and Hazardous Recyclable Material Regulations
PrecisCROSS-BORDER MOVEMENT OF HAZARDOUS WASTE AND HAZARDOUS RECYCLABLE MATERIAL REGULATIONS in order to (1) consolidate and streamline the requirements set out in the Export and Import Regulations, the Interprovincial Movement Regulations and the PCB Waste Export Regulations; (2) provide the flexibility required to more efficiently implement the electronic movement tracking system under development; (3) adjust the scope and harmonize the definitions of hazardous waste and hazardous recyclable material; and (4) improve the management of permits and the overall administration of the Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0025 Publication Date: 2021-03-17
AttachmentsAttachment
